item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/08/19/zendesk-support-going-live/#comment-465">Tab McDaniel</a>.
David, we're going to cover this issue in our training sessions, but most of the actions that open ServiceNow tickets will open ZenDesk tickets instead.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tab McDaniel.

David, we’re going to cover this issue in our training sessions, but most of the actions that open ServiceNow tickets will open ZenDesk tickets instead.

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description: A question from David MacFarland: I believe that the Service Now ticketing system is still going to be in use at UCSF. Is it possible that tickets will be opened using Service Now rather than ZenDesk and come to the Library? If so, how should they be handled? If this possibility has already been addressed and I missed it please let me know. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: A question from David MacFarland: I believe that the Service Now ticketing system is still going to be in use at UCSF. Is it possible that tickets will be opened using Service Now rather than ZenDesk and come to the Library? If so, how should they be handled? If this possibility has already been addressed and I missed it please let me know. Thanks.
